game_name: Vessk: Play with hand and desk!
game_description: Touch, scratch and tap your desk to control games! A casual gaming hub that lets you experience the game with your bare hands! This app is not compatible with Oculus Home desks and couches. But don't worry, you can set up your desk immediately after starting the game. Features: ★ Take full advantage of hand tracking! ★ MR experience! ★ Free of charge! Free coin! ★ In-game rankings, achievements and following others! ★ No controller required (if the battery runs out, no matter!) ★ Fun and easy-to-play games! (Whack an animal, Ball panic in tube) ★ You can aim for a high score, collect followers, collect achievements, or develop your own style of play! ■ Vessk is a VR game and SNS that aims to become a space like below: ・ Everyone can play for a long time. ・ Follow other players and connect with them in a loose way. ・ You have your own space and you don't have to stress. ・ And above all, you can be absorbed in playing.
review_2: First Impressions video review here: https://youtu.be/j8tIvXPBMOQ The feeling of hitting the desk with your real hands is really cool, there are just two games right now but there are more on the way, should be interesting to see how this game develops!
review_3: This desk gaming concept has potential to be fun when more in-app games become available.
